QuestionReportAbuse.name: QuestionReportAbuse
QuestionReportAbuse.description: Represents a user-reported abuse on a Question in a Chatter Answers zone.

Name.description: The name of the Question from which the user reported abuse.

QuestionId.description: The ID of the Question from which the user reported abuse.

Reason.description: The reason the user reported abuse on the Question, such as Spam, Hateful, or Inappropriate.
